column4: Hello. I want to crop a small area from a .ps or .pdf file and save as a new gs/pdf on ubuntu. The package pdftk doesn't seem to support this. Where can I find some info about those operations? Does anyone know an irc channel for postscript/ghostscript related things?
I don't know, but I think the package flpsed might help. Take a look
Thank you. I'll have a look ...
I checked flpsed but there's no function crop or similar. You only can add text to an existing ps doc.
